Papers

    On the Clustering of Compact Galaxy Pairs in Dark Matter Haloes

    Yiran Wang, Robert J. Brunner, Apr 2014

    We find and study the clustering behavior of compact galaxy groups in the SDSS DR7.

    Efficient Storage of Photo-Z PDFs

    Matias Carrasco-Kind, Robert J. Brunner, Apr 2014

    We have developed a new method for storing photo-z PDFs more efficiently

    Novel Bayesian Combination of Photo-Z PDFs

    Matias Carrasco-Kind, Robert J. Brunner, Mar 2014

    We have developed a new method for combining photometric redshift PDFs.

    SOMZ: Maps for Photo-Z

    Matias Carrasco-Kind, Robert J. Brunner, Dec 2013

    We have developed a new random atlas estimation technique for photometric redshift PDF estimation.

    SDSS DR7 Galaxy Two-Point Angular Correlation Function

    Yiran Wang, Robert J. Brunner, Jul 2013

    We calculate the galaxy two-point angular correlation function for the SDSS DR7

    TPZ: Trees for Photo-Z

    Matias Carrasco-Kind, Robert J. Brunner, Mar 2013

    We have developed a new random forest technique for estimating photometric redshift PDFs.

    Narrow absorption line variability in repeat quasar observations from the Sloan Digital Sky Survey

    Troy Hacker, Robert J. Brunner, Feb 2013

    We have identified, for the first time ever, variability in intervening narrow absorption quasar systems.

    The SDSS DR7 Galaxy Angular Power Spectrum: Volume-Limits and Galaxy Morphology

    Brett Hayes, Robert J. Brunner, Feb 2013

    We calculate the SDSS DR7 galaxy angular power spectrum.

    SDSS DR7 Galaxy Angular Power Spectrum

    Brett Hayes, Robert J. Brunner, Apr 2012

    We calculate the SDSS DR7 galaxy angular power spectrum.
